name: Nextmv
headline: A DecisionOps platform that accelerates optimization AI teams
description: Nextmv is a DecisionOps platform that accelerates optimization AI teams with tools for deployment, testing, CI/CD, collaboration, and management of decision models. With Nextmv, developers can create scalable, custom decision services complete with unique API endpoints and options to integrate with popular solvers and modeling solutions.

founders.name: Carolyn Mooney, Founder
founders.description: Systems engineer and analyst. Always interested in automating and optimizing decisions.

founders.name: Ryan O'Neil, Founder
founders.description: Optimization AI ‚Äî Integer Programming, Constraint Programming, and Decision Diagrams. Cat and early music enthusiast. Founding nextmv.io. Prefers Go.

# **The better way to build decision models**
Get more decision models live faster with Nextmv and its end-to-end DecisionOps workflow and toolset. 
[Try for free](https://nextmv.io/<https:/cloud.nextmv.io/signup>)[Jump to demo](https://nextmv.io/<#jump-to-demo>)
[ü™ÇImproving operator UX for optimization modelsRegister now >>](https://nextmv.io/<https:/www.nextmv.io/videos/improving-how-business-users-interface-with-optimization-and-decision-models>)
# **The better way to build decision models**
Get more decision models live faster with Nextmv and its end-to-end DecisionOps workflow and toolset. 
[Try for free](https://nextmv.io/<https:/cloud.nextmv.io/signup>)[Jump to demo](https://nextmv.io/<#>)
### Decision models add real business value...
They save time, generate revenue, drive sustainability goals, and increase productivity in the face of scale and complexity.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/60f810ea60c62debeb3c19e1_Company-Paid%20Retreats.svg)Vehicle routingMeal delivery, people transport, ecommerce, etc. ](https://nextmv.io/</routing>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/60f810b18cce2dc05c61528b_Family%20Leave.svg)Shift schedulingHealthcare, education, warehousing, etc. ](https://nextmv.io/</scheduling>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/60f86fa15c1db5790a9d0e3d_Investors.svg)Price optimizationMaximize returns while accounting for cost of waste. ](https://nextmv.io/</price-optimization>)
### ...but the go-live path isn't always smooth
As a result, teams have to build and manage bespoke tools for managing, testing, and collaborating on decision models. 
  * Research work never transitions to live operations
  * Launch requires precious engineering resources
  * Testing is hard to keep track of and reproduce
  * Business stakeholders lose confidence in ‚Äúblack box‚Äù models
  * Managing config becomes an engineering time suck


## Nextmv efficiently manages the full decision model lifecycle
Nextmv is a platform that provides a DecisionOps workflow for efficient model validation and management, a model marketplace for specific use cases, and a suite of modeling and solver integrations (commercial and open source). 
### Bring your code to the platform
Unify, manage, and operationalize all your decision models in one place - from prototype to test bench to production. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6760ac17271cf8690d6a105d_illustration-github-code-connected-nextmv-platform-diagram.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6761f991b4438446fc05028d_mobile-illustration-github-nextmv-app-connection.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/676aadde3b4bd1e69c96fb1e_illustrated-screenshot-bring-your-own-code-v9.png)
.
### Test and validate model quality
Feel confident in the code you ship. Run experiments that account for business KPIs, simulate scenarios, and shadow production. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6761b9da367cecc472b44793_illustration-testing-acceptance-nextmv.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/676205452b67e022046bb41e_mobile-illustration-acceptance-test.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/676aad51ee4001c8a787d676_illustrated-screenshot-acceptance-test-shadow-test-v9.png)
.
### Maintain a system of record
Observe and log the performance of all your decision models. Audit run history, detect root causes, monitor decision quality, and more. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6762052c3e39b9826ba0e042_mobile-illustration-run-status-history.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6761b9f0e577167b3b5a85d4_illustration-run-history-status.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/676aaf89a5ea184ae8c98d38_illustrated-screenshot-system-of-record-v10.png)
.
## Integrate with your existing tools
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/67649ffc7c9e2c5918ad5506_illustration-logo-boxes-gurobi-ampl-highs-hexaly.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/67649bb484f9845ab63f5376_mobile-illustration-integration-tools-logos-v1.png)
## What's the return you get with Nextmv?
Nextmv's DecisionOps workflow helps teams launch faster, feel more confident in the code they ship, and maximize the return on their decision model investment. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6765d6714b92ffac6679ea09_illustration-without-nextmv-with-nextmv-math-v10.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/67649d8b5e2d28768067b2bf_mobile-illustration-without-nextmv-math-v1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/67649da6a9eb21336f84306d_mobile-illustration-with-nextmv-math-v1.png)
### What does this mean for you?
#### Ops researchers, data scientists
Focus on modeling, not on building tooling
  * Confidently validate and launch models
  * Integrate with popular modeling tools and solvers
  * Create a system of record for models at scale
  * Build advocacy for operations research


#### Software devs, infra engineers
Easily integrate & monitor models as services
  * Observe decision models with custom logging
  * Autoscale with managed infrastructure
  * Implement CI/CD for smoother operations
  * Run online shadow tests to increase confidence


#### Business stakeholders
Get insight into how models provide real-world value
  * Account for your custom business KPIs
  * Test, run, and audit models from a web UI
  * Access reports with from a shared team space
  * Scale model impact with transparent operations


#### Teams that use Nextmv
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6691b06e547f6ace61d8f1df_customer-logo-grubhub-horizontal-color-v1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6691b0794a679815ec9e2ebb_customer-logo-taskrabbit-horizontal-v1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6691b0934a679815ec9e4222_customer-logo-veho-horizontal-color-v1.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6691b2c3690e076e99b5017d_customer-logo-hopskipdrive-horizontal-color-v2.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6691b0af486c44096e1f4315_customer-logo-kale-horizontal-v1svg.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6711209e3036680401efd960_customer-logo-matchback-systems-mbsi.svg)
"Nextmv has helped our team quickly and consistently launch multiple iterations of our decision model for our customers. We‚Äôve been able to rapidly deploy new optimization capabilities, which complement our agile development cycle."
- Tammy Leurquin, Matchback Systems CTO
## Take a tour of how Nextmv works
[General Overview](https://nextmv.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Routing Example](https://nextmv.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Custom Model Example](https://nextmv.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
## Go ahead, hop to it!
Start with a pre-built app or add your own model code. And if you need a hand, simply reach out to our team. 
[Try for free](https://nextmv.io/<https:/cloud.nextmv.io/signup>)[Talk with us](https://nextmv.io/</contact>)

# **The better way to build decision models**
Get more decision models live faster with Nextmv and its end-to-end DecisionOps workflow and toolset. 
Try for free‚ü®17‚ü©Jump to demo‚ü®24‚ü©
### Decision models add real business value...
They save time, generate revenue, drive sustainability goals, and increase productivity in the face of scale and complexity.

  * Research work never transitions to live operations
  * Launch requires precious engineering resources
  * Testing is hard to keep track of and reproduce
  * Business stakeholders lose confidence in ‚Äúblack box‚Äù models
  * Managing config becomes an engineering time suck

Nextmv is a platform that provides a DecisionOps workflow for efficient model validation and management, a model marketplace for specific use cases, and a suite of modeling and solver integrations (commercial and open source). 
### Bring your code to the platform
Unify, manage, and operationalize all your decision models in one place - from prototype to test bench to production. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6760ac17271cf8690d6a105d_illustration-github-code-connected-nextmv-platform-diagram.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60ca04db4f6f99b4bc1e050f/6761f991b4438446fc05028d_mobile-illustration-github-nextmv-app-connection.svg)

.

generated_description:
Nextmv is a company that was founded in 2019 and is based in Philadelphia, PA. It emerged from Y Combinator's W20 batch and has grown to a team of 22 employees. The company positions itself as a DecisionOps platform aimed at empowering optimization AI teams with robust tools for deploying, testing, continuous integration and delivery (CI/CD), collaboration, and management of decision models.

The core mission of Nextmv is straightforward: to simplify and accelerate the process of creating scalable, custom decision services that can easily integrate with popular solvers and modeling solutions via unique API endpoints. This is particularly relevant for industries involved in logistics and supply-chain management, where decision-making processes can intrinsically benefit from enhanced optimization practices fueled by AI.

Nextmv‚Äôs platform addresses several common challenges that teams face when moving from research to operational deployment of decision models. For instance, teams often struggle with messy handovers from development to production, requiring bespoke tools for testing and collaboration. Nextmv offers a solution that streamlines the entire lifecycle of decision models, helping teams transition their innovations into live operations more efficiently.

Some of the standout features of Nextmv include:
- A DecisionOps workflow for efficient model validation and management.
- A model marketplace tailored for specific use cases.
- Comprehensive support for a variety of modeling and solver integrations, both commercial and open source.
- Tools that allow teams to bring their own code, ensuring that existing solutions can be unified and managed in a single platform.

In practical terms, this means that operations researchers, data scientists, software developers, and even business stakeholders can all benefit. Researchers can focus on modeling rather than building support tools, while developers can easily integrate and monitor models as services. Business stakeholders gain clarity around how these models drive real-world value and can oversee performance easily.

Nextmv has already impressed several notable clients, as evidenced by testimonials from companies like Grubhub and TaskRabbit, showcasing their ability to rapidly iterate and deploy optimization capabilities.

In summary, if you're involved in decision-making processes in logistics or supply chains, and you're interested in making those processes more efficient through AI, Nextmv might just be the platform to explore. Check them out at [nextmv.io](https://nextmv.io).
